topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Manage Your Cloud

body.p: The HP Helion OpenStack dashboards are browser-based interfaces that enable you to manage your entire cloud environment.
The dashboards are based on OpenStack Horizon and provide enhanced features.

ul.li: How to use the HP Helion OpenStack Dashboards — Describes the Project and Administration dashboard user interface dialogs and options.
Using HP Helion OpenStack for Users — Describes the Operational Dashboard user interface dialogs and options.

body.p: Note: Administrators can perform all of the user tasks in addition to the admin tasks.

ul.li: Using HP Helion OpenStack for Administrators — Describes the Operational Dashboard user interface dialogs and options.
